sentences.en: All her wiles were to persuade them to buy the goods.
sentences.cn: 她花言巧语想打动他们买这些货物.

sentences.en: Do you think you could persuade them over to see me?
sentences.cn: 你觉得能劝说他们到这里来见我 吗 ?

sentences.en: Efforts to persuade the remainder to follow suit have continued.
sentences.cn: 说服其余人跟着效仿的努力仍在继续。

sentences.en: Eisenhower used his muscle to persuade Congress to change the law.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔用他的影响力说服国会修改了该项法律。

sentences.en: I could not persuade myself that this exciting moment would ever come.
sentences.cn: 我无法使自己相信这个激动人心的时刻会到来.

sentences.en: I did my damnedest to persuade her.
sentences.cn: 我尽了最大的努力去说服她。

sentences.en: I failed in my attempt to persuade her.
I’m trying to persuade your dad to buy some shares.
sentences.cn: 我正在尽力说服你爸爸买些股票。

sentences.en: It is difficult to persuade the superpowers to disarm.
sentences.cn: 要说服超级大国裁军是很难的.

sentences.en: It's easy to persuade him if you go the right method.
sentences.cn: 只要你的方法得当,说服他并不难.

sentences.en: No matter how hard we tried to persuade him, he wouldn't listen.
sentences.cn: 任我们怎样劝说, 他也不听.

sentences.en: Numerous attempts to persuade him to write his memoirs came to nought.
sentences.cn: 无数次劝他写回忆录的尝试均以失败告终。

sentences.en: Try to persuade him to come.
We had the devil's own job to persuade him to take part.
sentences.cn: 我们说服他参加可费了一番周折。

sentences.en: Will this be enough to persuade Congress to cough up?
You should persuade her to marry you outright.
sentences.cn: 你应该彻底劝服她嫁给你.

words.tran_cn: 有说服力的；劝诱的，劝说的

trans.tran_en: to make someone decide to do something, especially by giving them reasons why they should do it, or asking them many times to do it
